data.author: James Smith (@poeia)

changelog.release_notes: Casio CA-53W 1.1 - Display cleanup, menu icon fixed, and bluetooth vibration bug fixed (hopefully, will continue to test).
Casio CA-53W 1.0 - Initial release of my first watchface for the Pebble.

data.description:
Casio CA-53W - The Retro Calculator Watch for the Pebble

Step back into 80's and 90's pop culture with the Casio CA-53W, the retro calculator watch worn by Walter White from "Breaking Bad" and Marty McFly from "Back to the Future". Hand pixelated by myself, this Pebble watchface stays true to the original with every minute detail. From the location of each part of the time and date display to the text decorated around the watchface, I hope that you enjoy wearing this on your wrist, and possibly feel a little sense of nostalgia.

If you found an issue, please send me an email.

Features

 - Original retro display that includes day, hour, minute, second, and period
 - Date display mode from the original watch that shows by a quick shake, lasting three seconds
 - Bluetooth connectivity notification in place of the time signal notification of the original
 - Battery notification in place of the alarm notification of the original

latest_release.release_notes: Casio CA-53W 1.1 - Display cleanup, menu icon fixed, and bluetooth vibration bug fixed (hopefully, will continue to test).

data.title: Casio CA-53W
